channel.title: Problem with running my server
channel.description:
When I went to run my server, this just came up and now I can't connect to my server: [code]
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14 1) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:66) Saving players... Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code] Any ideas on a fix? Don't suggest a new base, I want a fix not a suggestion.

item.title: Problem with running my server
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“stefano1911, post:2, topic:406561”]try recompile if u see errors in compiler fix them and compile again…[/quote]Got no errors when I compiled, but it worked. Thanks mate.

item.title: Problem with running my server
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

When I went to run my server, this just came up and now I can’t connect to my server:


Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14
1)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
        at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:66)
Saving players...
Could not find the main class: server.Server.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Any ideas on a fix?
Don’t suggest a new base, I want a fix not a suggestion.

Read full topic
